name: kindred souls (Aaron's artist nook)
description:
Welcome To Dark and decrepit world of New Phoenix one of the many cities set in post-apocalyptic America after the nukes fell in the Kaiju raid in 2025. This is a dark psychological horror action adventure visual novel heavily inspired by cyberpunk Red Pacific Rim and numerous other popular pop culture items.  it's mainly focused on the aspects of romance discovering the truth of oneself and discovering what the meaning of humanity is deep within one's self

 the game is set in the city of New Phoenix, a city that was established 5 years after the nukes that dropped in 2025 when the game is actually set the player will never truly know. There'll be 3 romanceable characters that will all lead to their different endings. their secrets Buried throughout the novel or plans to be implemented sooner on. Find small Snippets of Lord throughout the world scattered through character dialogue and interactions.

 You play as Ambrose, a 22 year old young man who was orphaned and sent to live in new Phenix City after his parents died in a freak accident. one day casually at work a massive event happens that leads to the destruction of New Phoenix. The bulk of the journey will take place after the destruction of New Phoenix City.

 the romance content will mainly focus on m/m and after a major events nb/m.There is a lot of purposeful lgbtq references and representation throughout the novel both in characters and in-game dialogue.  hopefully in the future there will be NSFW content as well as eegee's but that's plans for the future.

The game is created by the solo. Who's uploading this  Aaron that would be me. visual novel was always a passion project of line starting from early high school close to my graduation finally having the means of actually getting it done in creating it has been a long-time dream of mine.

(Massive shout too @cirklare both here and on discord this person saved my life and helped make all of this possible so thanks and good luck to him and go support him when he has his own projects up)
